name: Terraborne; ORIGINS DX(Demo V1)
description:
NOT FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT OKAY WITH ANY OF THE FOLLOWING
Death
Swearing
Romance(eventually)
Dark-ish Jokes(Soon)

made in RPG Maker MV, using Defualt RTP, and Yanfly Plugins

more info will be written down Later

this is a better version of my game in which I had uploaded on RPG Maker Fes, on the Nintendo 3ds(I will change that to match this with some edits due to limitations)

mac, linux, & other versions will be compiled & uploaded when I'm done with this project, for now it's windows only

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement
Enter - Select, Proceed with Dialogue(hold to speedrun Dialogue)
Esc - Cancel
